about_the_game:
5omeday is an adventure game that was hosted on the free game posting site Unityroom and created at the game jam Unity1Week.

This game became very popular, earning high praise at the game jam and going viral via social media and gameplay videos, with some videos amassing over 3 million views.

Thanks to this, the game currently has reached over 300,000 total plays.

The Steam version currently offers multiple languages, including simplified Chinese, traditional Chinese, English, and voiced Japanese, and you can switch languages in-game.

Story

If she tries anything shady or attempts to hurt you, push that button right in front of you.

It will execute her instantly.

Game Features

・Basic controls are click-only.

・13 possible endings depending on your choices.

・1 play-through takes about 5 minutes.

Remake Changes

This is a remake of the free game "5omeday."

・New character illustrations, voice recordings, scenario, stills, endings, and recorded music added.

・Addition of unlocked ending list and skip text feature

Credits

Programming & Scenario: Indigo Ingots

Art: polaritia

Sounds: Kazura's MUSIC

Note

When streaming, please include the game title and the URL of this page in the summary field.

content_descriptors.notes:
The story in this game takes place in a fantasy world.
You can execute a dragon girl suspected of a crime at any time if she is about to harm you.

It does not contain bleeding, violence or sexual content.

name: イツカノヨル Demo
short_description: You have been assigned to guard a dragon girl set to be executed at the end of 5 days and have the ability to kill her instantly at any time with the push of a button in this multi-ending visual novel.

*languages with full audio support
